title: Key Table Row Counts / Ana Tablo Satır Sayıları
description: Shows row counts for key EBS operational tables

queries.sql: SELECT owner, table_name, num_rows, last_analyzed FROM dba_tables WHERE owner IN ('GL', 'AR', 'AP', 'PO', 'ONT', 'WIP') AND table_name IN ('GL_JE_HEADERS', 'AR_PAYMENT_SCHEDULES', 'AP_INVOICES', 'AP_INVOICE_LINES', 'PO_HEADERS', 'PO_LINES') ORDER BY owner, table_name

doc_hint: Shows row counts for key EBS operational tables. Compare with prior snapshots to detect anomalies. Stale statistics indicate need for GATHER_TABLE_STATS.
analysis_prompt: Review key table sizes. Report: (1) unusually low/high row counts, (2) if statistics are recent, (3) recommend GATHER_TABLE_STATS if stale, (4) check for data integrity issues.
